name: autohide the menu & sidebar [The Register]
description: Hides The Register's header and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
additional_info:
The thin vertical bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header and footer. Mouse over them to restore the element. 2013-10-03 Readability improvements:
  • Move the article sidebar to the right of the article
  • On zoom (ctrl+plus) let the article become wider, but no wider than the screen
